name: My Dentures!
description:
My Dentures is a game about going deeper and deeper to recover your dentures.

I really lose my hand on the scope on this one, I have to adapt the gameplay many times because halfway I knew that there's no chance I’ll finish it in time, I was very surprised that the gameplay turns quite fun after so much adaptation.

I only wish I have the time to fix some edge cases, because of the way I implemented randomness in the game, it could generate really really easy runs or really hard ones, still, I think anyone could complete in a couple of tries and less than 5 minutes.

I hope you guys have fun with it, It was super fun to mess around with this concept during the jam!

INSTRUCTIONS:

Move: WASD or Arrows

0) Land in the enemy = Insta kill

1) You will go down when Steps == 0

2)  Potions = Heal

3) Sword = +Attack

4) Shoes = Insta go down
